jobs.description: InterSystems is a vendor for high-performance, multi-model database platforms that drive application development and data management solutions. Its technology spans several industries, including finance, government, supply chain, and healthcare, of which Epic Systems is a premiere client.
experiences: Wrote packageable demo for testing database read and write speeds when ingesting data from Kafka message service
Implemented Velero backup feature for sandbox that hosts Kubernetes-based InterSystems applications
Built pipeline customization tool that allows for configuration of loading, transformation, and validation steps for data in varied formats
Designed interface for managing topology of data (primary keys, data types, etc.) in disparate sources available for loading

jobs.description: Codementor is a platform that connects users with freelance software developers to complete desired projects or generally help with coding. It's the largest code mentorship community in the world.
experiences: Maintained relationships with clients by providing thoughtful documentation and progress updates
Created Python application for cryptocurrency trading based on momentum strategy
Assembled pipeline for building, testing, and version control in order to distribute code as PyPI packages

jobs.description: Gravyty provides AI-driven tools and automation with the purpose of increasing fundraising capacity and community engagement. Their customer base consists mostly of higher education institutions and nonprofits.
experiences: Expanded email template feature by connecting to a Yelp API and providing restaurant meeting suggestions with dynamic location
Constructed Django web page for viewing donor interaction history, including search and filter inputs
Spun off spaCy natural language processing module into microservice for more optimized vertical scaling
Developed functionality for determining if text is referencing holidays or other moments in time

jobs.description: Boston College collaborated with Amazon Alexa in order to develop a classroom Alexa skill that facilitates activities like discussions and note-taking.
experiences: Held ongoing discussions with professors to collect stakeholder feedback and design applications based on user stories
Built JavaScript APIs to retrieve assignments and discussion questions from Canvas, as well as store notes in Google Sheets
Utilized speech recognition software and dialogue management techniques to produce organic interactions between Alexa and end users
